comments.body:
Or at least add a resource pack in the marketplace

And don’t forget to make them say hello every 10 seconds :)
Thanks RedKnightC i almost forgot! Youre a true hero haha :D
อยาก ได้ อัน เล็ก ครับ มัน อยู่ ที่ ประมาณ 150 ครับ ทำ ไง ครับ ?
Plsssssss
Me ajudem
Most likely a new camera around the character, like in CoD mobile

Es verdad puede que allá una nueva cámara como en cuarta persona como si nosotros nos mobieramos y estuviéramos por el otro lado de la aldea

[It's true that there's a new camera as in the fourth person as if we were mobiating and we were on the other side of the village] - translated by Admin
es mmuy bueno
Minecraft is not working multiplayer in 1.16.0.58
Es buena
it's a good idea you earned a vote
i agree its realy annoying
Can't get the profile settings to appear so I can change the online settings.
Doesn't this already exist?
I mean a way to sort worlds in game, like in folders for easier access.

I was just going to suggest this but i searched and saw you already said it and I 100% agree there should be folders that can be sorted in a variety of ways and the gui looks like a Ibis X folder ui please that would be so great!
I would really like it for Java and bedrock
Cool idea
for added functionality maybe it could even save it as a notepad file so when you switch to the other version you can just load the notepad file or if you switch computers
Cool idea, but it seems as though it would be OP if it fueled the furnace too long, or too inconvenient to keep tapping or clicking on the furnace.
This is exactly what is needed here, also in PE

The width is not such a problem (it should be enlarged for advancement packs though) for default Minecraft advancements but the height is definitely too small so it's not comfortable to view larger trees like that one in Adventure tab. I think zooming in/out is unnecessary as it doesn't seem to appear in any other UI.
Why? It’s a button you can ignore
I want this so bad!
Jackpl1
와 기발 하시다

최고
저도 한국 마크 유저입니다
좋은 생각이군요

독도는 우리땅!
마인크래프트의 베타를 해지해주세요
I know that you can do an auto refill (Java) by looking at the block already placed and click in the middle mouse button (scroll) and it auto refills.
I would really like to have an automatic refill whenever I run out of a stack. Voted.
We already have middle click

This really should be a thing, even if only as an option. There are a few mods that will do similar, but they can't be used on many servers due to the PVP advantage. If it was just part of the game, plugins could prevent use in PVP zones/combat shortly after. It's unlikely that mod devs are going to make a PVP-safe version of the mods though.
I think it should automatically load the slot above it in the inventory slot empties if it contains the same item or a stack of the same items.
Would love it! Always asking myself, why this hasn‘t made its way into the game yet.

Great idea! However a few things might be altered.

The crops and flowers in range feels more like part of a mod, not in vanilla minecraft.

Technically, in bee hives, there are frames on which the bees make their comb. The wax is attached to individual frames, rather than the lid, so it wouldn't make a cracking noise, but more one similar to the barrel noise already in minecraft.

This is actually intended and a great feature. That marker is NOT the player, it is the location of the map itself, within the area that it is displaying.

Do not remove this marker.

Honestly, this is a good feature as is, put a map on every nether portal in the world and there's an instant map for navigating/waypointing large distances

Not only that there's already a way to 'remove' this marker from the map anyway, simply make the map without a compas in the first place, no player location while you're making it and no green map location icon once it's placed, it's kinda makes it useless as a map if you can't see where you are on it especially at larger scales but if you want wall art it's fine

I kind of want a way to follow/see players using maps in itemframes, it'd be good to have a sense of who's in the world and where they're working
As we have banners that allow us to create a "you are here" position, there's no need for the marker to indicate this as standard.
Bedrock version doesnt allow the use of banners to mark the map so this is useful for this
i can't have my hud small and have it flush with the bottom at the same time on ps4

This seems like such a small and straightforward change that amounts to a great quality of life update!  I remember this functionality back in the day, but now Bedrock, it just doesn't work.  And thanks to OP for explaining it so well!

I agree. I also believe that they should and this to the bedrock edition for window 10 players, since they are added so much Java parity. The ability to organized your hotbar/inventory would be and nice quality of life feature and would make oraganizing your inventory so much quicker and easy especially for pvp players.
yes
Bring back custom world gen and add more features like biome selection .

This could make exploration much more interesting, as variety would be much greater, and it would optimize the game for older computers, as a smaller file could contain all more biomes for resources and a general look for different builds.

Yes, it is a very useful idea! I doesn't like the villages and the dark forest biome. :(

Plus: enable/disable option to the generated structures.

I would like to have an option to generate worlds with a biome size between default and large. Indeed, I find that the biomes are actually too small to be immersive, so I sometimes play with the "Large Biomes" option, but in this case, journeys are way too long and boring. An intermediate size would be perfect. I saw that large biomes are 4 times bigger than normal ones, so I think 2 is the best intermediate factor.

As KonamiCodes suggests a "Small Biomes" option, maybe the best would be to have a cursor or something like that to choose the biome size within a range of values or between selected ones. In fact, it was the case before 1.13 : it was possible to choose a value between 1 and 8, default size was 4, current large was 6 (so it was possible to choose 5). Source : https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Customized

Please bring back the option "Small Biomes". I want to play SkyBlock with my friends, but with the normal biome size, its impossible.

Maybe some options would be great. Like the biome-size-factor compared tot the standard-size.

It would be really great.

Thank you
I think old customized should come back, with a couple changes. The new version is too confusing for some people.
Oh
how to join a party with your friend??

Small UI is a big problem on the switch as well. The screen is small, so UI needs to be as big as possible. There is so much unused space on the screen, UI scaling would make it much easier to play. The text is unnecessarily small, and lots of blocks that look similar is indistinguishable at this size. Like the different types of ores, stone, etc. Look at this image, of how small these inventory slots look from my perceptive as a player.

On minecraft beta 26.0.27 the UI is generally small and there is no function, only -1 0 personally I don't like it because I played with the UI in 1, thank you if you change this function with appreciation a minecraft player.
I absolutely agree. Have my single vote - not that it'll help very much, sadly.
SpawnLegacy000 - you seem like a very reasonable person! I read your comment here and am grateful that you agree with me. I would like to get in touch with you on Discord, if possible.
Not sure if this was in the game when posted, but if you shift click on the trading button it works!
I definitely agree. This would be so useful!
Yeah there was one then it got removed in a new update for Minecraft and it’s super confusing with it gone now and it would be good for it to be back
This feature would improve pvp capabilities on bedrock, evening the playing field between bedrock and console edition players.
I don't think they should change double tap for locking in crouch, they should just make it so also can crouch while you're holding the button
I wish this could happen, but because Minecraft bedrock is connected to your X-Box account, you have permanent achievements, not advancements
Maybe a balence. But I CAN NOT complete all the achievments! They are very general about achieving them, but you you need  to do something very specific to get them done
